references: I. Adler, Three Diophantine equations - Part II, Fib. Quart., 7(1969), pp. 181-193.
A. H. Beiler, Recreations in the Theory of Numbers, Dover, N. Y., 1964, pp. 122-125, 194-196.
E. I. Emerson, Recurrent Sequences in the Equation DQ^2=R^2+N, Fib. Quart., 7(1969), pp. 231-242.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6,-1).
maple: a[0]:=1: a[1]:=10: for n from 2 to 26 do a[n]:=6*a[n-1]-a[n-2] od: seq(a[n], n=0..19); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jul 26 2006
author: _Barry E. Williams_, May 04 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, May 05 2000
